definitions.definition: One who hangs, or causes to be hanged; a hangman , paper hanger, etc.
A person who attempts suicide by hanging.
That by which a thing is suspended.

subdefinitions.definition: A strap hung to the girdle, by which a dagger or sword is suspended.

definitions.definition: ( now historical ) A short and broad backsword , worn so to hang at the side, especially popular in the 18th century.
( baseball , slang ) A hanging pitch ; a pitch (typically a breaking ball or slider ) that is poorly executed, hence easy to hit.
( Australian rules football , informal ) Synonym of spectacular mark .
( climbing ) A device secured by a bolt and used to attach a carabiner .

main_definition: One who hangs, or causes to be hanged; a hangman , paper hanger, etc.
secondary_definitions: A person who attempts suicide by hanging.
That by which a thing is suspended.
( now historical ) A short and broad backsword , worn so to hang at the side, especially popular in the 18th century.
( baseball , slang ) A hanging pitch ; a pitch (typically a breaking ball or slider ) that is poorly executed, hence easy to hit.
( Australian rules football , informal ) Synonym of spectacular mark .
( climbing ) A device secured by a bolt and used to attach a carabiner .

definitions.definition: Hunger and anger , especially when the anger is induced by the hunger.

main_definition: ( slang ) Hunger and anger , especially when the anger is induced by the hunger.
